definitions.name: Smtp:Port
definitions.description: The port for the SMTP server.

definitions.name: ConnectionStrings:Migrate
definitions.description: The connection string to use for migrating the database to the latest version. The distinction is made between Migrate and General because Migrate can have additional permissions, which is a possible security risk.

definitions.name: ConnectionStrings:General
definitions.description: The connection string to use for general use.

definitions.name: Smtp:Username
definitions.description: The username/email of the SMTP user to use for sending system emails

definitions.name: Smtp:Password
definitions.description: The password of the SMTP user to use for sending system emails.
